dfm.treeview.enable.name: Tree view enabled
dfm.treeview.enable.description[zh_CN]: 用于判断是否允许在视图中切换树形视图模式
dfm.treeview.enable.description: Used to determine if the view support tree view mode

dfm.open.in.single.process.name: Open folder windows in a separate process
dfm.open.in.single.process.name[zh_CN]: 在单独的进程中打开文件夹窗口
dfm.open.in.single.process.description[zh_CN]: 用于判断是否在单独的进程中打开文件夹窗口
dfm.open.in.single.process.description: Used to determine whether to enable Open folder windows in a separate process

dfm.icon.griddensity.level.name: Icon grid density level
dfm.icon.griddensity.level.description[zh_CN]: 控制图标网格密度级别

dfm.custom.fixedtab.name: Custom tabs
dfm.custom.fixedtab.description: It's used to configure custom tabs in the file manager.
dfm.custom.fixedtab.description[zh_CN]: 用于配置文件管理器中的自定义标签页。

dfm.pinned.tabs.name: Pinned tabs
dfm.pinned.tabs.description: It's used to configure pinned tabs in the file manager.
dfm.pinned.tabs.description[zh_CN]: 用于配置文件管理器中的固定标签页。

dfm.detailview.remote.image.maxsize.name: Maximum image size for detail view on remote/optical devices
dfm.detailview.remote.image.maxsize.name[zh_CN]: 网络和光盘设备详细视图中图片原图加载的最大文件大小
dfm.detailview.remote.image.maxsize.description: Maximum file size in bytes for loading original images in detail view when files are on remote mounts or optical devices. Files larger than this will skip to thumbnail loading. Default is 30MB (31457280 bytes).
dfm.detailview.remote.image.maxsize.description[zh_CN]: 当文件位于网络挂载或光盘设备时，详细视图中加载图片原图的最大文件大小（字节）。超过此大小的文件将跳过原图加载直接使用缩略图。默认为30MB（31457280字节）。
